components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We've become aware of a potential issue affecting all agents trying to connect to Flex. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to T-Mobile Network in the US for a subset Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages to T-Mobile Network in the US for a subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: IOT Network Issues in Africa Due to Fiber-Cut

incident_updates.body:
Connectivity issues in Africa have significantly improved for impacted countries. At this time we are observing metrics consistent to those prior to the outage. Please not that there is still reduced capacity on the continent for some countries and this could present itself as increase latency and lower throughput until the issue is fully resolved by the network operators. 

We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Due to issues with multiple underwater cables that handle connectivity to Africa, connectivity for cellular IoT products, Super SIM and Programmable Wireless, in the region may be severely impacted up to being completely down. Impact and recovery time across networks and countries may vary significantly. Repairs to the cable could take considerable time and service may not return to normal until complete. We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries in Africa

incident_updates.body:
It has been determined that there are additional Countries and Network Operators impacted, below is a list of currently known Network Operators experiencing delivery delays and/or failures:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Cameroon:  Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange
- Ghana: Vodafone
- Gambia: Comium
- Ivory Coast: Orange, MTN, Moov
- Niger: Etisalat
- Sierra Leone: Africel

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are still observing degradation for these two networks:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange

Additionally, we are still experiencing SMS delivery delays to the following Network Operators and Countries: Orange Cameron, Orange Ivory Coast, MTN Ivory Coast, Moov Ivory Coast, Etisalat Niger and Africel Sierra Leone. We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to observe degradation for the below Countries and Network Operators:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are seeing recovery for Network Operators and Country: Orange Burikina Faso, Orange Equatorial Guinea and Vodafone Ghana, while we are still experiencing SMS delivery delays to the following  Network Operators and Country: Orange Cameron, Orange Ivory Coast, MTN Ivory Coast, Moov Ivory Coast, Etisalat Niger and Africel Sierra Leone. We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Multiple Networks and Countries in Africa. 

Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the Incidents for each affected Country. The following Countries and respective Network Operators are impacted:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Cameroon:  Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange
- Ghana: Vodafone
- Ivory Coast: Orange, MTN, Moov
- Sierra Leone: Africel

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 March 2024 at 09:00 PDT until 21 March 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting
